customer_reviews.title: Small and compact, yet genius
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for the sole purpose that is a 2-in-1 mouse and keyboard device with Bluetooth connectivity. I have many computers that I run almost like a server so I don't have them all connected to keyboards/mice making this item a godsend for me. I can plug it in any computer and it works instantly. It has made going between all my computers so much easier. I do not have to deal with 2 devices (keyboard and mouse) and there connections anymore. This simple item has solved this dilemma for me. I strongly recommend this product for making your like much easier should you need a device to quickly go between different computers or maybe for an HTPC.
